comprehensive_overview: PyFR is an open-source Python-based framework for solving fluid dynamics problems on many-core architectures.
core_features: PyFR enables the solution of the compressible fluid dynamics equations using high-order finite element spatial discretization and high-order time-stepping techniques. It supports a wide range of computational platforms and accelerators, including CPUs, GPUs, and Intel Xeon Phi processors. PyFR also includes robust parallelization strategies and efficient implementation of algorithms to achieve high-performance computing.
